OpenVQA Documentation¶

ViLmedic (Vision-and-Language medical research) is a modular framework for vision and language multimodal research in the medical field. ViLmedic contains reference implementations of state-of-the-art vision and language architectures, referred as “blocks” and full solutions for multimodal medical tasks using one or several blocks.

This repo is currently maintained by JB Delbrouck.

ViLMedic
